ygData.subject: Gas attack!

: BrightBlade quickly jumps out of the way as Rex shots towards her, the 
shots harmlessly hitting against the door of the brig CR room.
This just wasn't going any good.
With one last attempt to act without trying to harm the bot that had saved 
her live, BrightBlade removed a small container from her leg compartment and 
looked it over.
THis...was nerve gas.
It would dispatch an enemy and ensure that they went into stasis lock within 
2 cycles.
It was rather quick and responsive.
With a simple flick of her wrist she tossed the small container towards Rex, 
it opening and dispelling a clear gas as soon as it hit the floor.
She had to watch it though, she was rather running out of tricks to pull out 
of her magic bag.
This would work now, it had to.
All there would be left to do was to wait for Perndabot to find her and bust 
her out of here.*
